Summary: driving home i took video of the object i seen
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Galesburg
There was one other sighting in Galesburg on or around May 23rd 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my way home from work, it was at 9:14 pm..i was just cruzing along and i noticed a really bright light just south east of the moon. it was just above the horizon and intirally to big to be a star. so i took out my cell phone and recorded a video of the object..i was not forsure what it was cause ive never seen it on my drive home like that before. ive been looking for it at the same time everynight since and its not there ! idk, im lost on what i saw and have recorded ! in the video you can clearly seee the moon. the camera im using is not very good plus im driving trying to record the object if you pause the video at 1 second look to the right of the moon just on the horizon you can see the object clearly !
